oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ-i Qaṣīdah-ʼi Burdah : manuscript, 1661
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Aḥmadābādī, Dawlat Muḥammad ibn Fatḥ Muḥammad (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 19 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. Portions of text underlined or punctuated in red
Commentary finished in Muḥarram 917 AH [1511 AD].
According to colophon (ff. 88v), copy completed in the hand of Dawlat Muḥammad ibn Fatḥ Muḥammad Aḥmadābādī on 12 Rabīʻ al-Awwal 1072 AH [Nov. 5, 1661 AD].
MS Persian 87. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
